item.title: Akhanda 2: Shoot kicks off in this holy place - 123telugu
item.description:
Akhanda 2: Shoot kicks off in this holy place

Published on Jan 13, 2025, by 123telugu

The much-anticipated sequel to the blockbuster Akhanda, titled Akhanda 2, has officially begun shooting amidst the vibrant atmosphere of the Maha Kumbh Mela in Prayagraj.

  • Akhanda 2 is directed by Boyapati Srinu and features Nandamuri Balakrishna.
  • The film's first part, released in 2021, grossed over Rs. 100 crores.
  • The sequel is set to hit cinemas on September 25, 2025.
  • The film is being produced by Raam Achanta and Gopi Achanta under 14 Reels Plus.
  • Tejaswini Nandamuri, Balayya's daughter, will present the film.
  • Music for the film is being composed by Thaman.
“The shooting has kickstarted today at the Maha Kumbh Mela, capturing the true essence of faith and devotion.”

This exciting commencement of filming marks another milestone for the Akhanda franchise and promises to deliver an entertaining action narrative for fans.

item.title: Veer Pahariya meets family of war hero who inspired his character in Sky Force: ‘Left me moved and humbled’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Veer Pahariya meets family of war hero who inspired his character in Sky Force

Publication Date: Jan 13, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Veer Pahariya, making his Bollywood debut in Sky Force, recently met with the family of Squadron Leader Ajjamada Boppayya Devayya, the war hero who inspired his character.

  • Veer Pahariya shared touching moments with Devayya's 90-year-old wife, Sundari, and their daughters in Bengaluru.
  • He expressed his admiration for the family and their legacy, stating it left him moved and humbled.
  • The film Sky Force will be released on January 24, 2025.
  • Akshay Kumar stars as an Air Force officer seeking revenge for his fallen comrades in the film.
“It is difficult to put into words the emotions I felt today... Hearing anecdotes from his family left me deeply moved and humbled.”

The meeting between Veer and the Devayya family showcases the impact of heroic legacies on new generations in cinema.

item.title: Leonardo DiCaprio, Vittoria Ceretti face backlash for evacuating from LA fires in private jet - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Leonardo DiCaprio and Vittoria Ceretti Face Backlash for Evacuating LA Fires in Private Jet

Date: Jan 13, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Amid the ongoing wildfires in Los Angeles, actor Leonardo DiCaprio and his partner Vittoria Ceretti are receiving significant backlash for evacuating via private jet. Critics are questioning DiCaprio’s commitment to climate advocacy after his choice of transportation.

  • DiCaprio, known for his environmental activism, took a private jet to escape the fires.
  • The decision sparked outrage online, with many labeling him a hypocrite.
  • Critics highlighted the environmental impact of private jets, especially during a climate crisis.
  • Several celebrities have lost homes due to the wildfires, while others like Eva Longoria have contributed to relief efforts.
“The eco warrior shows his true colors! Never liked him. What a schmuck.”
“What a f*****g hypocrite.”

This incident highlights the contradiction between advocating for environmental sustainability and the actions taken in times of personal crisis.

item.title: Amitabh Bahchan is shocked to learn his lookalike fooled fans, caused traffic jam: 'Hamare naam se kya kya ho raha hai' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Amitabh Bachchan Reacts to Lookalike Causing Traffic Jam

Date: Jan 13, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Amitabh Bachchan was surprised to learn from a contestant on KBC 16 about a lookalike who not only fooled fans but also caused a traffic jam while posing as the star.

  • A contestant shared his experience meeting a doppelganger of Amitabh Bachchan.
  • The lookalike created a crowd and a traffic jam as fans believed Amitabh was present.
  • Bachchan humorously reacted by stating, "Hamare naam se na jaane kya kya ho raha hai" (What all is happening in my name).
  • Bachchan participated in KBC 16 and has had successful films in 2024.
“On meeting him, I felt I am actually meeting you, sir,” the contestant remarked.

This amusing incident highlights the impact of celebrity lookalikes on social behavior, reflecting both admiration and humor associated with Amitabh Bachchan.

item.title: Preity Zinta shares her family is ‘safe as of now’ amid LA wildfires: ‘I never thought I would live to see a day where…’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Preity Zinta assures fans her family is safe amid LA wildfires

Date: January 12, 2025 Source: The Indian Express

Amid the raging wildfires in Los Angeles, Bollywood star Preity Zinta shared an update about her family's safety and expressed her heartbreak over the devastation around her.

  • Preity Zinta stated she is 'safe as of now' during the ongoing wildfires.
  • She expressed her emotional response to the fear and uncertainty the wildfires have caused.
  • Zinta thanked the firefighters and prayed for those affected by the fires.
  • Other celebrities, including Nora Fatehi and Priyanka Chopra, shared their experiences related to the wildfires.

I never thought I would live to see a day where fires would ravage neighbourhoods around us in LA, friends & families either evacuated or put on high alert.

The wildfires have impacted numerous people, including several Hollywood celebrities, leading to evacuation orders and significant property damage.

item.title: Ranbir Kapoor, Kareena Kapoor’s cousin Aadar Jain marries Alekha Advani at a white wedding in Goa; Karisma Kapoor, Neetu Kapoor - The Indian Express
item.description:
Aadar Jain and Alekha Advani Celebrate White Wedding in Goa

Publication Date: January 13, 2025   |   Source: The Indian Express

Aadar Jain and Alekha Advani exchanged vows in a beautiful Christian-style wedding in Goa, attended by close family members and shared on social media.

  • The wedding featured prominent members of the Kapoor family, including Karisma Kapoor and Neetu Kapoor.
  • Alekha wore a elegant white dress, complemented by Aadar's dapper grey suit.
  • Neetu Kapoor shared photos from the wedding, showcasing family moments.
  • Other loved ones, including Anissa Malhotra, also shared glimpses of the joyous occasion.
Aadar and Alekha got 'rokafied' in November 2024 amidst family celebrations.

With a rich history of friendship, Aadar and Alekha’s wedding marks a beautiful union witnessed by family and friends.

item.title: Jayam Ravi changes name to Ravi Mohan; announces his own production banner and fans organisation - The Hindu
item.description:
Jayam Ravi Changes Name to Ravi Mohan; Announces His Own Production Banner and Fans Organisation

Date: January 13, 2025

Source: The Hindu

Tamil actor Jayam Ravi has officially changed his name to Ravi Mohan as he embarks on a new chapter in his personal and professional life. Amid the release of his upcoming film, Kadhalikka Neramillai, he expressed his desire to be addressed by his new name and also announced the launch of his production banner and fan organization.

  • Ravi Mohan is set to be known by this name moving forward, aligning it with his aspirations.
  • He launched Ravi Mohan Studios, focusing on compelling narratives and nurturing new talent.
  • Ravi has formed the Ravi Mohan Fans Foundation to give back to the community.
  • He aims to positively impact society through this foundation's philanthropic efforts.
“Let’s make it a year of positivity, purpose, and progress.”

This transition marks not only a personal shift for the actor but also an expansion of his commitment to the film industry and the communities that support him.

item.title: Aadar Jain, Alekha Advani's pre-wedding bash brings Kapoor clan together; Karisma's daughter Samaira steals spotlight - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aadar Jain and Alekha Advani Celebrate Pre-Wedding Bash in Goa

Date: Jan 13, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Aadar Jain and Alekha Advani commenced their pre-wedding festivities with a lavish party in Goa, celebrating with their close friends and family, including several members of the Kapoor family.

  • The bash was a pre-wedding celebration, not the actual wedding.
  • Attendees included Rima Jain, Armaan Jain, Neetu Kapoor, Karisma Kapoor, and Samaira Kapoor.
  • Images from the event were shared on social media by family members, with Samaira receiving particular attention for her elegant appearance.
  • Aadar and Alekha got engaged in September 2024 and made their relationship public in November 2023.
“The celebration in Goa was a pre-wedding party and not the wedding, HT confirmed.”

This festive gathering marks the beginning of an exciting wedding season for Aadar and Alekha as they prepare to take their vows.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 40: Allu Arjun's movie continues its successful run | Today News - Mint
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 40: Allu Arjun’s Movie Continues Its Successful Run

Publication Date: January 10, 2023

Source: Live Mint

Pushpa 2 has maintained its strong performance at the box office, even amidst new releases. Following a drop in collection when Ram Charan's Game Changer was released, the film rebounded over the weekend, clocking in significant earnings.

  • The film earned ₹4.35 crore net during the weekend.
  • Day 40 collection was approximately ₹31 lakh as of 5:00 PM.
  • Hindi version contributed significantly with over ₹802 crore net overall.
  • Total worldwide box office collection stands at ₹1722.10 crore gross.
  • The film was made on a budget of ₹400–500 crore.
"Even in its sixth week, the Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer continues to dominate the Indian box office."

Pushpa 2 remains a considerable success, with expectations of sustaining its audience reach as it heads into later weeks.

item.title: 'Game Changer' box office collection day 4 early estimates: The Ram Charan, Kiara Advani starrer inches t - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Game Changer Box Office Collection Surges Towards Rs 100 Crore

Publication Date: 2023-10-24 Source: Times of India

As the fourth day of box office collections for 'Game Changer' shows promising early estimates, the film, featuring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, is inching closer to the significant milestone of Rs 100 crore.

  • The film has received positive reviews, contributing to its box office success.
  • Early estimates suggest that the collection is set to reach approximately Rs 90 crore by the end of the fourth day.
  • Both Ram Charan and Kiara Advani have garnered praise for their performances.
“This film is expected to resonate well with audiences, driving up ticket sales significantly.”

With such momentum, 'Game Changer' is poised to become one of the highest-grossing films of the year.

item.title: Ranbir Kapoor to transform into a 'different look' for 'Dhoom 4', set to begin filming in April 2026: Rep - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Ranbir Kapoor to transform into a 'different look' for 'Dhoom 4', set to begin filming in April 2026: Report

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

Ranbir Kapoor is preparing for a major transformation for his role in 'Dhoom 4', with filming scheduled to start in April 2026. This new look is expected to surprise fans and marks a significant chapter in the Dhoom franchise.

  • Kapoor's character will undergo a considerable makeover.
  • Filming is set to commence in April 2026.
  • This installment aims to escalate the stakes and excitement from previous Dhoom films.

item.title: Ranbir Kapoor to transform into a 'different look' for 'Dhoom 4', set to begin filming in April 2026: Report - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Ranbir Kapoor to Transform for Dhoom 4, Filming Begins April 2026

Publication Date: TBD | Source: TBD

Ranbir Kapoor is set to debut a new look for his role in the much-anticipated 'Dhoom 4', with filming scheduled to begin in April 2026. This transformation is expected to excite fans and mark a significant step in his acting career.

  • Ranbir Kapoor will showcase a 'different look' for his character in 'Dhoom 4'.
  • Filming is confirmed to start in April 2026.
  • The new look is anticipated to be unique and engaging for audiences.
“I can’t wait to unveil this transformation on screen,” said Kapoor.

This transformation signals Kapoor's commitment to the role and highlights the evolving nature of his filmography.

item.title: Tamannaah Bhatia Exudes Elegance In A Red Abu Jani Sandeep Khosla Lehenga - NDTV
item.description:
Tamannaah Bhatia Exudes Elegance In A Red Abu Jani Sandeep Khosla Lehenga

Publication Date: Not specified Source: NDTV

Tamannaah Bhatia captivated audiences with her striking appearance in a red lehenga designed by Abu Jani Sandeep Khosla.

  • The actress showcased an embellished Bandhani kurta and a crushed silk lehenga.
  • She accessorized minimally, opting for a chunky stack of bangles and a tight bun hairstyle.
  • Previously, she wore an orange lehenga by Karan Torani featuring intricate designs and modern silhouettes.
Tamannaah Bhatia never fails to dazzle in traditional ensembles.

This appearance highlights Tamannaah's affinity for traditional attire and her skill in combining classic and contemporary styles.

item.title: Two unique promos cut for Rajinikanth’s Jailer 2 announcement - 123telugu
item.description:
Two unique promos cut for Rajinikanth’s Jailer 2 announcement

Published on Jan 13, 2025 4:18 pm IST

Superstar Rajinikanth, following his role in Vettaiyan, is set to return in the much-anticipated sequel Jailer 2, directed by Nelson Dilip Kumar. With significant excitement building around this announcement, the production house Sun Pictures confirmed that two unique promos for Jailer 2 will be unveiled soon.

  • Two versions of the promo have been created: a 4-minute-3-second version for YouTube and a 2-minute-23-second version for theaters.
  • The premiere of the promo is scheduled for 6 PM tomorrow on YouTube, alongside screenings in select theaters.
  • Fans are eagerly anticipating surprises from the makers, which could be a significant milestone in Rajinikanth’s career.
"Excitement is reaching fever pitch, with Jailer 2 expected to be a significant milestone in Rajinikanth’s iconic career."

The unveiling of these promos is highly anticipated among fans, marking what could be a pivotal moment in Rajinikanth’s illustrious acting journey.

item.title: Ranbir Kapoor, Kareena Kapoor’s cousin Aadar Jain marries Alekha Advani at a white wedding in Goa; Karisma Kapoor, Neetu Kapoor share pics - The Indian Express
item.description:
Aadar Jain, Kareena Kapoor’s cousin, marries Alekha Advani at a white wedding in Goa

Date: January 13, 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

Aadar Jain and Alekha Advani exchanged wedding vows in a picturesque ceremony in Goa, attended by notable family members of the Kapoor clan, including Karisma Kapoor and Neetu Kapoor.

  • The couple shared personal moments on Instagram, showcasing their wedding day.
  • Alekha wore a white dress with a veil, while Aadar donned a grey suit.
  • Members of the Kapoor family posted group photos from the celebrations.
  • The couple received heartfelt messages and videos from friends and relatives.
“Best friends to soulmates.” - Anissa Malhotra, sharing a special moment from the wedding.

The wedding marked a joyous occasion for the Kapoor family, celebrating love and togetherness.

item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: Madha Gaja Raja Box Office Day 1: Vishal’s Film Makes 244% Higher Opening Than Vanangaan! - Koimoi
item.description:
Madha Gaja Raja Box Office Day 1: Vishal’s Film Makes 244% Higher Opening Than Vanangaan!

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 Source: Koimoi

Tamil actor Vishal Krishna Reddy returns with his long-awaited sci-fi action comedy, Madha Gaja Raja, which finally released on January 12, 2025, during the Pongal holidays. The film, shot in 2012, faced significant delays but has now made a strong box office debut.

  • The film earned 3.10 crores on its opening day, achieving impressive numbers despite mixed reviews from critics.
  • It opened with 244% higher earnings compared to the recent release, Vanangaan, which only made 0.90 crores.
  • Last year's Pongal featured major releases like Captain Miller and Ayalaan, earning 8.50 crores and 4 crores respectively.
  • Madha Gaja Raja also stars Anjali, Varalaxmi Sarathkumar, and Sonu Sood among others.
“The film has finally arrived in theatres after a decade of struggles.”

As it stands, while Madha Gaja Raja is not far behind Ayalaan's earnings, it still trails significantly behind Captain Miller's success. There are hopes that positive word-of-mouth will enhance its performance during the festive period.

item.title: Watch: BLACKPINK’s Jisoo Announces Solo Comeback Date With Mysterious New Teaser - soompi
item.description:
Watch: BLACKPINK’s Jisoo Announces Solo Comeback Date With Mysterious New Teaser

Date: January 13, 2025 Source: Soompi

BLACKPINK’s Jisoo is gearing up for her highly anticipated solo comeback, as she dropped a teaser revealing February 14 as the significant date.

  • Jisoo released a mysterious teaser at 6 p.m. KST on January 13.
  • This marks her first solo release in nearly two years.
  • The teaser hints at her upcoming promotional activities leading to the solo album.
"Are you ready for Jisoo’s comeback? Stay tuned for more updates!"

Jisoo's return is expected to excite fans, following her previous successful debut album “ME” and its hit title track “FLOWER”.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: From Shilpa Shirodkar’s fight with sister Namrata to Karan Veer Mehra opening up about his alcoholism; Top revelations from the show - The Times of India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: From Shilpa Shirodkar’s fight with sister Namrata to Karan Veer Mehra opening up about his alcoholism; Top revelations from the show

Date: October 2023 Source: Entertainment News

In a recent episode of Bigg Boss 18, Shilpa Shirodkar became emotional while sharing a personal story about her relationship with her sister Namrata Shirodkar, revealing the impact of familial bonds on her experience in the house.

  • Shilpa Shirodkar discussed a fight with her sister Namrata that occurred just before entering the show.
  • She expressed her emotional turmoil over missing her family and the support they provide.
  • Filmmaker Anurag Kashyap's appearance on the show led to an impactful discussion about Shilpa’s feelings.
  • Shilpa shed tears reminiscing about the strained relationship and her longing to reconcile.
“Meri aur uski ek fight ho gayi thi jab main andar aa rahi thi. Toh do hafte main usse baat nahi ki. I really, really miss her a lot.” - Shilpa Shirodkar

This episode highlighted the emotional struggles faced by contestants on reality shows and the complexity of personal relationships.

item.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Rajat sleeps with Ashika and Kiaan in their room; Savi to feel jealous - India Forums
item.description:
Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Rajat sleeps with Ashika and Kiaan in their room; Savi to feel jealous

Published: Monday, January 13, 2025 at 8:26 AM

The upcoming track in the drama revolves around the complexities of Rajat and Savi's relationship as Ashika's interference leads to jealousy and tension.

  • Ashika intends to create a family environment with Rajat and Kiaan.
  • Savi waits for a chance to keep Rajat from being manipulated by Ashika.
  • An upcoming scenario involves Ashika locking Savi out, intensifying the conflict.
  • Past incidents reveal potential rifts due to Ashika's plans and Kiaan's accident.
“Driven by his son's love, Rajat will have to go to the room, and Ashika will lock the door on Savi, making her jealous.”

The upcoming episodes promise to reveal whether Rajat will stand by Savi or give in to Ashika's schemes.

item.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai: Armaan lashes out at Abhira infront of the class; Abhira feels insulted - India Forums
item.description:
Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai: Armaan lashes out at Abhira in the class; Abhira feels insulted

Published: Monday, January 13, 2025 at 7:56 AM

In the upcoming episodes of the popular Star Plus show, tensions rise as Armaan confronts Abhira in class, resulting in her feeling deeply insulted.

Key Points:

  • Armaan has taken a position as a professor at the college where Abhira studies.
  • Their relationship is strained following a major accident caused by Vidya.
  • Abhira attempts to reconcile with Armaan but is met with anger and public humiliation.
  • Armaan emphasizes the professional boundaries as professor and student during their confrontation.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

Armaan scolds Abhira in front of the entire class, calling out her recent emphasis on maintaining a professional teacher-student relationship.

The upcoming episodes promise significant developments as both characters navigate their tumultuous relationship amidst personal and familial challenges.

item.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai: Armaan lashes out at Abhira in the class; Abhira feels insulted - India Forums
item.description:
Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai: Armaan lashes out at Abhira in the class; Abhira feels insulted

Published: Monday, January 13, 2025 at 7:56 AM | Source: Star Plus

The upcoming episodes of the show feature dramatic tensions as Armaan, now a professor, lashes out at Abhira in front of their classmates, leading to her feeling deeply insulted.

  • The plot revolves around the aftermath of a major accident caused by Vidya, affecting Armaan and Abhira's relationship.
  • Armaan is focused on supporting his mother, who is facing a 10-year sentence due to Vidya's mistakes.
  • Abhira attempts to reconcile with Armaan, but her efforts lead to public humiliation as he scolds her in class.
  • The tension highlights the struggle between personal relationships and professional boundaries in an academic setting.
“Abhira felt deeply humiliated after Armaan scolded her in front of the entire class.”

In conclusion, the unfolding drama highlights the complexities of personal relationships within the confines of academic roles, setting the stage for future conflict and reconciliation.

item.title: Black Warrant Twitter reviews: Vikramaditya Motwane delivers; fans say ‘a long-format victory we haven’t seen in ages’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Black Warrant Twitter Reviews: A Long-Format Victory We Haven't Seen in Ages

Date: January 13, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The latest OTT sensation, Black Warrant, has captured widespread attention for its gripping depiction of life inside Tihar Jail, drawing rich narratives from the experiences of a former jail superintendent.

  • Black Warrant premiered on January 10, 2025, and has received significant acclaim on social media.
  • The show is inspired by the non-fiction book Black Warrant: Confessions of a Tihar Jailer.
  • Many viewers praise its immersive storytelling and slow-burn narrative style.
  • The casting of the series has been highly appreciated, especially the performances of the ensemble cast.
  • Vikramaditya Motwane, known for Sacred Games, continues to validate his prowess in direction.
“After the peak era of web shows 4-5 years ago, Black Warrant is easily one of the best I’ve seen in a long time.”

Overall, Black Warrant is being recognized as a strong entry in the OTT space, combining fresh storytelling with standout performances.

item.title: ‘Don't go to Nagaland’: Amazon Prime Video shares social media post, deletes soon after | Today News - Mint
item.description:
‘Don’t go to Nagaland’: Amazon Prime Video shares social media post, deletes soon after

Publication Date: N/A Source: Live Mint

Amazon Prime Video shared a social media post featuring various characters urging viewers with humorous phrases not to go to Nagaland but later deleted the post, leading to discussions online.

  • The post included lines from characters in popular web series.
  • Examples include: “Take my handbag but don’t go to Nagaland” from Call Me Bae.
  • The intention was to promote Paatal Lok Season 2, set to stream on January 17.
  • The new season will follow a murder investigation in Nagaland.
“Citadel chale jao (go to Citadel) but don’t go to Nagaland,”

Amazon Prime Video faced backlash for the post and quickly removed it.

The post seems to have generated considerable buzz, likely due to its joking tone about a specific location.
